sentences.sentence: The persons and events portrayed in this production are fictitious.
sentences.translation: 这部作品描绘的那些人物和事件是虚构的。

sentences.sentence: The characters in this story are all fictitious.
sentences.translation: 这个故事里的人物都是假想的。

sentences.sentence: The story my mother told me when I was young is fictitious.
sentences.translation: 小时候妈妈对我讲的那个故事是虚构的。
